benchmark_details.name: CCrepairBench
benchmark_details.overview: A new, large-scale dataset for C++ compilation errors, constructed through a sophisticated generate-and-verify pipeline, designed for automated compilation repair.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive framework for automated C++ compilation repair.

data.source: Constructed through web scraping and a LLM-driven data generation and verification pipeline.
data.annotation: Automatically validated by comparing compiled outputs against expected errors.

methodology.calculation: Total reward R is gated by the classification from an LLM-as-a-Judge.
methodology.interpretation: High CSR and GFR indicate a successful repair.
methodology.validation: The model's performance was validated through comparative performance analysis.
